epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication and security features.
epics.description: Develop a secure login mechanism that includes multi-factor authentication to ensure that only authorized users can access the banking portal. This epic includes creating secure user sessions and managing secure storage of user credentials and session keys.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard for users.
epics.description: Develop a user-friendly, customizable dashboard that displays relevant banking products and services based on the user's profile and eligibility. This dashboard should provide users with an overview of their accounts, transactions, and other financial activities.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modifications
epics.summary: Enable users to submit account opening requests and service modifications.
epics.description: Implement streamlined workflows that allow users to submit new account opening requests and service modifications with minimal clicks. This includes forms for data entry, validation, and submission, along with workflows for approval and processing of these requests.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Develop a responsive design for the portal.
epics.description: Ensure that the portal is responsive and provides a consistent user experience across various devices, including desktop, tablet, and mobile phones. This involves implementing adaptive layouts and testing on different screen sizes and operating systems.

epics.title: Real-time Status Updates and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time status updates and notifications.
epics.description: Develop features to provide users with real-time status updates on their requests and transactions, along with email notifications. This ensures users are kept informed about the progress of their submissions and any necessary actions they need to take.

epics.title: Interaction History and Documentation Upload
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive interaction history and enable document uploads.
epics.description: Implement functionality to keep a detailed history of user interactions within the portal. Additionally, develop features to allow users to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface, ensuring that users can save and resume incomplete applications.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with the bank's core banking system.
epics.description: Ensure seamless integration of the self-service portal with the bank's existing core banking system. This involves developing secure APIs, data synchronization mechanisms, and maintaining a separate database to ensure optimal performance and reliability.

epics.title: Role-based Access Control
epics.description: Develop and implement role-based access control to ensure that users can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level. This includes defining roles, permissions, and access policies tailored to different types of users.

user_stories.title: Implement Secure Login Mechanism
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to log in securely, so that only authorized users can access the banking portal.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The login mechanism must include multi-factor authentication.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must enter a second factor after entering their password.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user has entered a correct password, when they are prompted to enter a second factor, then the login should be successful if the second factor is correct.

user_stories.title: Create Secure User Sessions
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my session to be secure, so that my account remains protected during my interaction with the portal.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Sessions should expire after a period of inactivity.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Sessions must expire after 15 minutes of inactivity.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is logged in, when they are inactive for 15 minutes, then their session should expire and require re-authentication.

user_stories.title: Manage Secure Storage of Credentials
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my credentials to be securely stored, so that my personal information is protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: User credentials and session keys must be securely hashed and encrypted.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: All user credentials must be stored in an encrypted format.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user's credentials, when they are stored, then they should be encrypted and saved securely.

user_stories.title: Develop a User-Friendly Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see a personalized dashboard, so that I can easily access relevant banking information.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should be customizable and user-friendly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The dashboard must display relevant accounts and transactions based on user profile.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is logged in, when they view their dashboard, then it should display their relevant accounts and transactions.

user_stories.title: Customizable Widgets
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to add and remove widgets on my dashboard, so that I can personalize my banking experience.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Widgets should be addable and removable by the user.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to add and remove widgets on their dashboard.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is on their dashboard, when they attempt to add or remove widgets, then those actions should succeed without errors.

user_stories.title: Overview of Financial Activities
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see an overview of my financial activities, so that I can keep track of my finances.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The dashboard must display a summary of accounts, transactions, and other financial activities.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The dashboard must provide a summary of all financial activities.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is logged in, when they view their dashboard, then a summary of their accounts, transactions, and other financial activities should be displayed.

user_stories.title: Streamline Account Opening Requests
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to submit account opening requests effortlessly, so that I can open new accounts with minimal hassle.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The process must involve minimal clicks and have clear data validation.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Account opening requests must be simple and quick.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user wants to open a new account, when they fill out the necessary forms, then the submission process should be straightforward with clear guidance if errors occur.

user_stories.title: Service Modification Requests
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to modify services associated with my account, so that I can customize my account features.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Service modifications should be simple with clear data validation and approval workflows.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Service modification requests must be simple and quick.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user wants to modify their account services, when they submit the modification request, then the process should be validated and approved quickly.

user_stories.title: Approval and Processing Workflows
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my requests to be approved and processed efficiently, so that I can start using the new account or modified service promptly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Requests must pass through defined approval and processing workflows.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: All requests must go through an efficient approval and processing workflow.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an account or service request, when it is submitted, then it should go through the approval and processing workflow promptly.

user_stories.title: Implement Adaptive Layouts
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to adapt to my device, so that I have a seamless experience on any screen size.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The design must be adaptive to various screen sizes and devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal must be functional on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accesses the portal on any device, when they navigate through it, then the interface should adapt correctly to their device's screen size.

user_stories.title: Consistency Across Devices
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a consistent experience across devices, so that I can use the portal without reorientation.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The user interface must maintain consistency in design across all devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The user interface should provide a consistent experience across different devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user switches devices, when they access the portal, then the interface and navigation should remain consistent.

user_stories.title: Cross-Browser Compatibility
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to work on different browsers, so that I have flexibility in choosing my browser.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The design must be tested and work on major browsers.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal must function correctly on different web browsers.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user uses a major web browser, when they access the portal, then it should function correctly without issues.

user_stories.title: Real-time Status Updates
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive real-time updates about my requests, so that I am always informed about their progress.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The system must provide real-time status updates on user requests and transactions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must receive real-time updates on their requests.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user has submitted a request, when they check the status, then it should reflect the real-time status of the request.

user_stories.title: Email Notifications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive email notifications about my requests, so that I am informed about any actions that need my attention.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Email notifications must be sent for significant updates on user requests and transactions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must receive email notifications for significant updates.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user has a significant update on their request, when an update occurs, then an email notification should be sent to the user.

user_stories.title: In-app Notifications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want in-app notifications about my requests, so that I donâ€™t miss any important updates when using the portal.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The system must show in-app notifications for user requests and transactions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must receive in-app notifications for significant updates.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is logged in, when a significant update occurs, then an in-app notification should appear.

user_stories.title: Maintain Interaction History
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see my interaction history, so that I can keep track of my actions in the portal.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: A detailed history of all user interactions must be maintained.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to view their interaction history within the portal.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is logged in, when they navigate to their history, then they should see a detailed record of their interactions.

user_stories.title: Document Upload Capability
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to upload documents securely, so that I can provide necessary documentation for my requests.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Users must be able to upload and securely store documents.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to upload documents when submitting requests.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is submitting a request, when they upload a document, then the document should securely upload without errors.

user_stories.title: Save and Resume Incomplete Applications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to save my incomplete applications, so that I can resume them later.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Users must be able to save incomplete applications and resume them later.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to save progress on incomplete applications.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is filling out an application, when they save it as incomplete, then they should be able to resume from where they left off.

user_stories.title: Develop Secure APIs
user_stories.description: As a API developer, I want secure APIs for integration, so that the portal can interact with the core banking system without security risks.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: APIs must be securely developed and authenticated.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: APIs must securely transmit data between the portal and the core banking system.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a secure API request is made, when the request is processed, then the data transmission should be secure.

user_stories.title: Data Synchronization Mechanisms
user_stories.description: As an integration engineer, I want data synchronization mechanisms, so that data between the portal and the core banking system is always in sync.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Data synchronization must be reliable and timely.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Data between the portal and core banking system must be synchronized accurately.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an update in the core banking system, when the portal fetches data, then the information must be up-to-date and synchronized.

user_stories.title: Maintain Separate Database
user_stories.description: As a system architect, I want to maintain a separate database for the portal, so that its performance and reliability are not compromised.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The portal must have its own database but allow integration with core banking data.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal must function with its database while integrating core banking data.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal is integrated, when data is accessed, then it should pull from its database and core banking as needed.

user_stories.title: Define User Roles
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to define user roles, so that users can have the appropriate access based on their profiles.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: User roles must be clearly defined and assigned.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Admin must be able to define and assign roles to users.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an admin is logged in, when they define a new role, then it should be saved and assigned correctly.

user_stories.title: Assign Permissions to Roles
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to assign permissions to roles, so that users can access services according to their roles.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Permissions must be assigned accurately based on roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Roles must have the correct permissions assigned.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an admin has defined roles, when they assign permissions, then each role should access the appropriate services.

user_stories.title: Access Policies for Different Roles
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to enforce access policies, so that users can only view and access services consistent with their roles.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Access policies must be enforced according to user roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Policies should restrict access appropriately based on roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user has a specific role, when they access services, then they should only see services permitted by their role.

architecture_generation.description: AWS architecture aligned to equivalent service mappings.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture diagram has been validated and enhanced to ensure all nodes and edges are consistent, unique, and complete. Placeholder nodes were added for missing references, and duplicate IDs were resolved. The architecture now adheres to the Azure Well-Architected Framework with improved security, reliability, and operational excellence. Quality rating: High.
